name: Sunny Side Down Chapter.1 beta
description:
• Slight gore
  • Body horror
  • Cute girls
  • Mild almost no swearing
  • Some screen flashing
  • Can be loud

You're a researcher at a facility specializing in anomalies and entities found around the world. One day you are tasked with an assignment to gather data on a woman who can seemingly alter reality. What will you find? What journey lies ahead? Is this a date? Find out in this demo!

  • A bunch of hand-drawn scenes
  • 2 Endings and more to come in the full version
  • A story where you are the main character

Link to my Instagram for future updates! - https://www.instagram.com/moosky_was_taken/

Notes

  • English isn't my first language, Polish is
  • This game will become a full story in the future

Sites/Resources used

Uncle Mugen's backgrounds - https://lemmasoft.renai.us/forums/viewtopic.php?f=52&t=17302

Sound effects - https://www.zapsplat.com/

Background music - https://pixabay.com/
